connectorTemplates.name: SAML Service
connectorTemplates.description: Sample SAML Authentication service for connecting to your IdP

configuration.desc: Issuer string to supply to identity provider (Defaults to: https://MBaaS_Service_Host/login/callback)
Full callback URL for IdP to send assertions back to (Defaults to: https://MBaaS_Service_Host/login/callback)
Name identifier format to request auth context - defaults to 'urn:federation:authentication:windows' (for AD FS)
Validate incoming SAML responses with your IdP's public certificate

connectorTemplates.name: Status Monitor Service
connectorTemplates.description: A service for monitoring the status of connectivity from Feed Henry to your remote end-points.

connectorTemplates.name: AeroGear Community Push Connector
connectorTemplates.description: A service for integrating AeroGear Push server & sending push notifications.

configuration.desc: The URL of the AeroGear instance to use
The Unique Application Id of the AeroGear app
The Master Secret Key of the AeroGear app
The Time to Live value for the submitted notification - default value = 3600

connectorTemplates.name: LDAP Authentication Connector
connectorTemplates.description: Authenticate users via LDAP

configuration.desc: The URL of the LDAP server (including 'ldap://')
The prefix to be added before the username when building the full Distinguished Name
The suffix to be added after the username when building the full Distinguished Name

connectorTemplates.name: Sharepoint
connectorTemplates.description: A service for integrating with Sharepoint

configuration.desc: Your Sharepoint username - omit if you don't plan on using a service account for this service
Your Sharepoint password - omit if you don't plan on using a service account for this service
Authentication type in use - optional, defaults to `basic`
Disable strict SSL - optional, defaults to `true`. Set to `false` to allow connecting to self-signed instances of Sharepoint.
Session Timeout - optional - defaults to 3,600 seconds (1hr). Sets the default duration a session is held for in the mobile cloud.
